about_the_game:
An iconic race from Master of Orion II has returned to conquer the stars!

The psychic Elerian join the original 10 races with their own emperors and advisors, new ship hulls and blueprints, and unique perks and personalities. The whole galaxy welcomes their arrival, just in time to face the return of the nefarious Antarans.

Born of the myriad islands of Draconis, the Elerians are a feudal civilization with a rigid caste system and immutable gender roles. At the top of their social order sits the Grand Marshal of the Fiefdoms, a warrior of great renown who binds all the Elerians to her will by military prowess. Only females may enter military life at any rank. Their males are relegated to the college forums, where they form the Philosopher caste, always studying and pushing their race's strange mental powers new limits.
detailed_description:
An iconic race from Master of Orion II has returned to conquer the stars!

The psychic Elerian join the original 10 races with their own emperors and advisors, new ship hulls and blueprints, and unique perks and personalities. The whole galaxy welcomes their arrival, just in time to face the return of the nefarious Antarans.

Born of the myriad islands of Draconis, the Elerians are a feudal civilization with a rigid caste system and immutable gender roles. At the top of their social order sits the Grand Marshal of the Fiefdoms, a warrior of great renown who binds all the Elerians to her will by military prowess. Only females may enter military life at any rank. Their males are relegated to the college forums, where they form the Philosopher caste, always studying and pushing their race's strange mental powers new limits.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit or newer, SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz or AMD Athlon X2 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 240, ATI 4650, Intel HD 4000 or better
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Video Memory: 512 MB
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit or newer, SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.8GHz or AMD Athlon X4 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 560, ATI 5870 or better
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended Video Memory: 1 GB

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac 10.6 - 10.11 (Snow Leopard - El Capitan)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz or AMD Athlon X2 2.2 GHz 
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia 240, ATI 4650, Intel Integrated HD4000 or better
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Video Memory: 512 MB
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac 10.6 - 10.11 (Snow Leopard - El Capitan)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.8GHz or AMD Athlon X4 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 560, ATI 5870 or better
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended Video Memory: 1 GB
